text: CGG may refer to: *CGG (company), a multi-national geophysical services company, formerly known as CGGVeritas * Compagnie Générale de Géophysique, a geophysical services company that merged to form CGGVeritas in early 2007 *The Canadian Grenadier Guards, infantry regiment of Canada's military reserve force *Church of the Great God *Campaign for Good Governance in Sierra Leone * Kiga language, ISO-639 language code
title: CGG
